title: Information Button or Icon standard type
content:
Is there a standard or universal typeface to be used for information signs or buttons or icons such as this?

If not, what is the font used in this attachment? Closest I got was garamond.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621151930im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Information_icon_6257.jpg)
author: chipotoole

comments.content:
I think the most recognized is the upright Bodoni-like one.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621151930im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0e7d0cd631a0e9e813dfa8b7ff7fd7_5917.gif)

I agree, but this is for the web and has to exist very small and the regular case falls apart - the italicized i works better in this case.

Any ideas for this italic i?
